trials.name: title
trials.description: The clinical trial's official title on clinicaltrials.gov. Must be unique.

trials.name: nct_number
trials.description: The clinical trial's National Clinical Trial (NCT) Number on clinicaltrials.gov. Include the 'NCT' prefix. Must be unique.

trials.name: phase
trials.description: The clinical trial's phase. Must be one of the following: 'Phase 1,' 'Phase 2', 'Phase 3', 'Phase 4', 'Not Applicable', or 'Other'.

trials.name: status
trials.description: The clinical trial's current status. Must be one of the following: 'Recruiting', 'Not yet recruiting', 'Active, not recruiting', 'Completed', 'Terminated', 'Suspended', 'Withdrawn', or 'Other'.

trials.name: condition
trials.description: The condition that the clinical trial addresses. Must be a condition that is currently in the API's database.

trials.name: study_type
trials.description: The clinical trial's study type (i.e., interventional, observational). Must be one of the following: 'Interventional', 'Observational', or 'Other'.

trials.name: intervention_name
trials.description: The name of the intervention being tested.

trials.name: intervention_type
trials.description: The type of intervention being tested (i.e., drug, diagnostic test). Must be one of the following: 'Drug', 'Biological', 'Behavioral', 'Procedure', 'Device', 'Dietary Supplement', or 'Other'.

trials.name: sponsors
trials.description: Any company or organization running the clinical trial.

trials.name: summary
trials.description: A brief summary of the clinical trial.

conditions.name: name
conditions.description: The condition's name. Must be unique.

conditions.name: description
conditions.description: A brief description of the condition.

conditions.name: types
conditions.description: Any condition types associated with the condition.
